text: "Caminemos pisando las sendas de nuestra inmensa felicidad" (; "Let Us Walk Treading the Paths of Our Immense Happiness") is the national anthem of Equatorial Guinea. ==Lyrics== ===Spanish original=== Spanish lyrics IPA transcription [kami틛nemos pi틛sando la 틛senda] [de 틛nwest쬬 im틛mensa feli풪i틛dad] [en f쬬te쬹i틛dad 틛sin sepa쬬틛풪jon] [kan틛temos libe쮊값ad] [틛t쬬s 틛dos 틛si토los de es틛ta some틛tidos] [틛baxo la domina틛풪jon kolo틛njal] [en f쬬틛te쬹a u틛njon 틛sin disk쬴mi틛na쬫 [kan틛temos libe쮊값ad] [토쬴틛temos 틛biba 틛lib쬰 토i틛nea] [i defen틛damos 틛nwest쬬 libe쮊값ad] [kan틛temos 틛sjemp쬰 틛lib쬰 토i틛nea] [i konse쮊각emos 틛sjemp쬰 la uni틛dad] [토쬴틛temos 틛biba 틛lib쬰 토i틛nea] [i defen틛damos 틛nwest쬬 libe쮊값ad] [kan틛temos 틛sjemp쬰 틛lib쬰 토i틛nea] 洧 [i konse쮊각emos i konse쮊각emos] [la indepen틛den풪ja na풪jo틛nal] 洧 ===Translations=== Portuguese lyrics French lyrics Fang lyricshttps://www.youtube.com/watch?si=CoxuVn6ljsv- xhXK&v;=ZBmvnkH5Ha4&feature;=youtu.be English translation Let us walk treading the paths Of our immense happiness. In brotherhood, without separation, Let us sing Freedom! After two centuries of being subjected By colonial domination, In fraternal union, without discrimination, Let's sing Freedom! Let us shout long live free Guinea!, and let us defend our Freedom. Let us always sing free Guinea, And let us always preserve the unity. Let us shout long live free Guinea!, and let us defend our Freedom. Let us always sing free Guinea, 洧 And let us always preserve National independence. 洧 ==References== Category:African anthems Category:Equatorial Guinea
title: Caminemos pisando las sendas de nuestra inmensa felicidad
